results.name: Transpose of array A075300.
comment: The top-left corner of the array looks like:

This can be used to construct mappings like A059884 and A075173, where the elements of the first row give the bit-positions where to interleave the first element of a finite vector of nonnegative integers, the second row the bit-positions for the second element, etc.
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
xref: Inverse permutation: A075303. Transpose: A075300. The X-projection is given by A025480 and the Y-projection is A007814(n+1). Cf. A002262, A025581.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 12 2002
